cheatsheet.title: Adding Tracker Features to the Tracker BI Toolkit

intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to add Tracker features to the Tracker BI Toolkit.

item.title: Open Software Updates
item.description:
To add Tracker Feature Plugins, open the Install New Software User Inteface.
From the workbench menu:
Help > Install New Software ...

item.title: Choose a Software Site
item.description: In the Work with pull down. Select the Tracker Release item.

item.title: Review Available Features
item.description: Select the arrow next to the entry name to display all the Tracker features you can install.

item.title: Select Features to Install
item.description:
Select the desired features for installation.
If your a new user just select the parent checkbox of the Tracker Feature Update entry to install all the features.
You can always uninstall features you do not need later.

item.title: Install the Features.
item.description:
Select the Install button in the upper right hand corner of the window to install the selected features.
Follow the directions given in the Updates Dialog boxes that follow.
